verbs.description: President Trump [V: has] approved tariffs on a list of 800 Chinese products targeting technologies where Beijing hopes to become a world leader , with an official announcement due today .

[ARG0: President Trump] has [V: approved] [ARG1: tariffs on a list of 800 Chinese products targeting technologies where Beijing hopes to become a world leader] , [ARGM-ADV: with an official announcement due today] .

President Trump has approved tariffs on a list of [ARG0: 800 Chinese products] [V: targeting] [ARG1: technologies where Beijing hopes to become a world leader] , with an official announcement due today .

President Trump has approved tariffs on a list of 800 Chinese products targeting technologies where [ARG0: Beijing] [V: hopes] [ARG1: to become a world leader] , with an official announcement due today .

President Trump has approved tariffs on a list of 800 Chinese products targeting technologies where [ARG1: Beijing] hopes to [V: become] [ARG2: a world leader] , with an official announcement due today .
